triples.name: Large language model
triples.relevance: The paper extends large language models to enable agent memory, reflection, and behavior synthesis capabilities.

triples.name: The Sims
triples.relevance: The interactive sandbox environment is inspired by The Sims, providing a familiar simulation context for agent interaction.

triples.name: Agent-based model
triples.relevance: Generative agents represent a novel instantiation of agent-based models using natural language and LLMs for emergent social behavior.

triples.name: Natural language processing
triples.relevance: The paper leverages NLP to record agent experiences and enable natural language interactions with the simulation.

triples.name: Emergence
triples.relevance: The paper demonstrates emergent social behaviors arising from simple individual agent rules and interactions.

triples.name: Automated planning and scheduling
triples.relevance: Agent planning is a core component where agents use memory and reflection to plan future actions and behaviors.

triples.name: Dialogue system
triples.relevance: The paper enables agents to engage in natural language conversations and interactions within the simulation environment.

triples.name: Intelligent agent
triples.relevance: Generative agents are autonomous software agents that perceive their environment and take actions to achieve their goals.

triples.name: Human behavior simulation
triples.relevance: The paper proposes believable simulation of human behavior including daily routines, social interactions, and reflective learning.

triples.name: Memory architecture
triples.relevance: The paper introduces an architecture that stores agent experiences as natural language records and synthesizes them into reflections.
